TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpenIdConnectOptions extends Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.RemoteAuthenticationOptions

Docs.summary: Configuration options for

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new
Docs.remarks:
Defaults:
AddNonceToRequest: true.
BackchannelTimeout: 1 minute.
ProtocolValidator: new .
RefreshOnIssuerKeyNotFound: true
ResponseType:
Scope: .
TokenValidationParameters: new with AuthenticationScheme = authenticationScheme.
UseTokenLifetime: false.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the method used to redirect the user agent to the identity provider.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Authority : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Authority to use when making OpenIdConnect calls.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClaimActions As ClaimActionCollection

Docs.summary: A collection of claim actions used to select values from the json user data and create Claims.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.ClientId : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the 'client_id'.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.ClientSecret : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the 'client_secret'.
Configuration provided directly by the developer. If provided, then MetadataAddress and the Backchannel properties will not be used. This information should not be updated during request processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ConfigurationManager As IConfigurationManager(Of OpenIdConnectConfiguration)

Docs.summary: Responsible for retrieving, caching, and refreshing the configuration from metadata. If not provided, then one will be created using the MetadataAddress and Backchannel properties.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DisableTelemetry : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Indicates whether telemetry should be disabled. When this feature is enabled, the assembly version of the Microsoft IdentityModel packages is sent to the remote OpenID Connect provider as an authorization/logout request parameter.
Gets or sets the to notify when processing OpenIdConnect messages.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.GetClaimsFromUserInfoEndpoint : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Boolean to set whether the handler should go to user info endpoint to retrieve additional claims or not after creating an identity from id_token received from token endpoint. The default is 'false'.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MaxAge As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
member this.MaxAge : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the 'max_age'. If set the 'max_age' parameter will be sent with the authentication request. If the identity provider has not actively authenticated the user within the length of time specified, the user will be prompted to re-authenticate. By default no max_age is specified.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MetadataAddress : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the discovery endpoint for obtaining metadata

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NonceCookie : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.CookieBuilder with get, set

Docs.summary: Determines the settings used to create the nonce cookie before the cookie gets added to the response.
Docs.remarks: The value of is treated as the prefix to the cookie name, and defaults to .

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Prompt : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the 'prompt'.
Gets or sets the that is used to ensure that the 'id_token' received is valid per: http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#IDTokenValidation

MemberSignature.Value: member this.RefreshOnIssuerKeyNotFound : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets if a metadata refresh should be attempted after a SecurityTokenSignatureKeyNotFoundException. This allows for automatic recovery in the event of a signature key rollover. This is enabled by default.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.RemoteSignOutPath : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString with get, set

Docs.summary: Requests received on this path will cause the handler to invoke SignOut using the SignOutScheme, or if that property is not set, SignInScheme.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.RequireHttpsMetadata : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets if HTTPS is required for the metadata address or authority. The default is true. This should be disabled only in development environments.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Resource : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the 'resource'.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.ResponseMode : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the 'response_mode'.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.ResponseType : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the 'response_type'.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scope As ICollection(Of String)

Docs.summary: Gets the list of permissions to request.
Gets or sets the used to validate identity tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.SignedOutCallbackPath : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString with get, set

Docs.summary: The request path within the application's base path where the user agent will be returned after sign out from the identity provider. See post_logout_redirect_uri from http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-session-1_0.html#RedirectionAfterLogout.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.SignedOutRedirectUri : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The uri where the user agent will be redirected to after application is signed out from the identity provider. The redirect will happen after the SignedOutCallbackPath is invoked.
Docs.remarks: This URI can be out of the application's domain. By default it points to the root.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.SignOutScheme : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The Authentication Scheme to use with SignOut on the SignOutPath. SignInScheme will be used if this is not set.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.SkipUnrecognizedRequests : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Indicates if requests to the CallbackPath may also be for other components. If enabled the handler will pass requests through that do not contain OpenIdConnect authentication responses. Disabling this and setting the CallbackPath to a dedicated endpoint may provide better error handling. This is disabled by default.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property StateDataFormat As ISecureDataFormat(Of AuthenticationProperties)

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type used to secure data handled by the handler.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property StringDataFormat As ISecureDataFormat(Of String)

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type used to secure strings used by the handler.
Gets or sets the parameters used to validate identity tokens.
Docs.remarks: Contains the types and definitions required for validating a token.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.UseTokenLifetime : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Indicates that the authentication session lifetime (e.g. cookies) should match that of the authentication token. If the token does not provide lifetime information then normal session lifetimes will be used. This is disabled by default.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

Docs.summary: Check that the options are valid. Should throw an exception if things are not ok.
